title: Weinstein and Schmachtenberger Search for Fullness Beyond Status and Pleasure
description:
Eric Weinstein's Portal podcast arrives at a fascinating conclusion. They realize that all the goods of status, pleasure and enjoyment only go so far. Could they point to something beyond this world? 

Gk Chesterton's "Heretics" made this point over 100 years ago. We know the good only because we know evil and we struggle to know the good as such. You cannot have progress unless you have a vision of the good. 

Portal 27 https://www.stitcher.com/podcast/kast-media-2/the-portal-2/e/68383234

GK Chesterton Heretics https://amzn.to/3aNvmTG

Oneida https://amzn.to/2wpitAs

Is Marriage Over? https://aeon.co/essays/marriage-is-dead-long-live-marriage-how-will-we-couple-up

Keep Christianity Weird https://www.theamericanconservative.com/dreher/keep-christianity-weird-sunday-st-mary-of-egypt/
